hero.title: Launch Your Online Store in Minutes
hero.subtitle: Complete platform to manage your e-commerce business easily and efficiently - Built for bakeries, groceries, and florists in Jordan
hero.cardTitle: Your Online Store Ready in Minutes

features.title: Platform Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to run your online store successfully

easySetup.title: Quick & Easy Setup
easySetup.description: Create your store in less than 5 minutes with no technical expertise required. User-friendly interface designed for the Jordanian market

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Orders
whatsapp.description: Receive orders directly on WhatsApp. Instant communication with your customers and increased sales

multiPayment.title: Multiple Payment Methods
multiPayment.description: Support cash on delivery and online payments. Make purchasing easier for your customers

customDomain.title: Custom Domain
customDomain.description: Get a custom link for your store like yourbrand.jeepoo.com to build a strong brand identity

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Track your products and inventory easily. Automatic alerts when stock runs low

analytics.title: Reports & Analytics
analytics.description: Monitor your sales and store performance through a comprehensive and easy-to-understand dashboard

howItWorks.title: How It Works?
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to launch your store

step1.title: Create Free Account
step1.description: Create your account in less than a minute and start adding products immediately

step2.title: Add Your Products
step2.description: Upload product images and add prices and details simply

step3.title: Start Selling
step3.description: Share your store link with customers and start receiving orders

cta.title: Ready to Launch Your Store?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of merchants who trust JeePoo to manage their business

footer.description: The leading e-commerce platform for small and medium businesses in Jordan
